job_tasks.phrase: Work directly with customers to gather and understand business requirements, translating them into effective CPQ configurations
job_tasks.justification: This phrase clearly indicates the need to understand customer needs and translate them into technical configurations, which is a core aspect of business understanding in a consulting context.

job_tasks.phrase: prioritizing customer success, AI-driven technology refactoring, and strategic realignment
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the alignment of technical initiatives with business strategy and customer outcomes.
This phrase refers to the practical application and implementation of technology, which falls under the umbrella of software development or solution implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: end-to-end configuration of the CPQ system
job_tasks.justification: Configuring a system, especially a complex one like CPQ, involves software-like implementation and setup, fitting within software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Apply AI tools and techniques to automate repetitive tasks, improve configuration speed, and enhance project delivery
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the application of AI tools and techniques to improve processes, which relates to leveraging models or AI capabilities.

soft_skills.phrase: practical, adaptable problem-solver with a hands-on approach to technology
constantly learning, especially in the realm of AI and CPQ
Work directly with customers to gather and understand business requirements

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on consulting, business requirements gathering, and configuring CPQ solutions. While it mentions applying AI tools, it does not detail the development, fine-tuning, or deep technical aspects of AI models required for an ML or GenAI Engineer role. The primary emphasis is on the business application of AI rather than its core engineering.
